content: english - crochet pattern christmas tree - link to written instructions 1 - link to youtube video of the pattern 2 nederlands - haakpatroon kerstboom - link naar uitgeschreven patroon 3 - link naar youtube video van het patroon 4 size and yarn if you crochet this christmas tree with sport weight yarn and a 2 5 mm crochet hook the tree will be approximately 10 cm high if you choose lace weight yarn and a 1 5 mm crochet hook the tree will be approximately 7 5 mm high 1 https //free-crochet-patterns com/free-crochet-pattern-christmas-tree-4/ 2 https //youtu be/b2m5uyu36-u 3 https //haakinformatie nl/patroon/feestdagen_seizoen/kerst-patroon/haakpatroon-kerstboom-5/ 4 https //youtu be/h8_r18youvc
